Text:
Hi zakimar,

Thanks for commenting on my torrent. 

I could wish that it was based on something you actually read from here or something I said, but you and I honestly know that your comment was uncalled for, and as much as I could wish, well let's just leave it at that.

Incidently, if you would like to have an onjective view you could download my other torrents and see for yourself. 

I am sure you can trust yourself to judge for yourself.
